title: connection error
body:
when i start game
its gives me error
i try again and again
and i connnct
but all my enemys lvl 3-5
so i cant play normaly
pls guys help me
https://gyazo.com/25b085f6c2c32f5fcd2ba004858991ba (the photo of the error sorry it's hebrew but its says try again and Turn OFF)
{{summoner:21}}

replies.body:
Hey elisey124s, 

I have ran into this issue before and found the best fix for it is Riots Connection KB. Make sure to follow the steps and if you have any issues reach out to me, i'll be on for awhile. 


Riot Connection KB: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
who of them its the fix of my problem?
